p.k: On her way home from school Lola stops off to buy a cereal bar. But when leaving the store the manager won't let her leave the store and accuses her of theft. Pat leads the investigation to prove his best friend’s innocence and find out who the real thief is… i.e. the Guanos (who created a huge diversion to steal the cereal bar stock). After a fierce struggle Pat sets the record straight!
